title: InBalance Chiropractic & Wellness Oklahoma City
description: At InBalance Chiropractic & Wellness, we believe in treating the whole body to ensure optimal health.
cleaned_text: REACH YOUR FULL HEALTH POTENTIAL At InBalance Chiropractic & Wellness, we believe in treating the whole body to ensure optimal health. While the foundation of our services is chiropractic care, we offer several additional services to promote full body wellness. You only get one body in life and we want to empower you to take great care of that body to reach your full health potential and maximize quality of life. We customize our treatment recommendations to your unique needs. You won't find a one-size-fits-all treatment plan at InBalance Chiropractic & Wellness, because each patient is different. [Call](tel:+1-405-445-6126) us today to schedule an appointment or learn more about our services and philosophy about natural health. HOURS & LOCATION Location Oklahoma City, OK 73112 Tel: 405-445-6126 Hours Mon, Tues, Wed, Fri 9:00 am - 12:30 pm and 2:30 pm - 5:30 pm Thursday - closed
